data.title: Enrolment for Nivelación 2023
data.meta_description: News website - Enrolment for Nivelación 2023-2024 SPA
data.text:
From 30 October to 10 November 2023 is the deadline for enrolment through the Academic Management System (https://sga.uteq.edu.ec/) by entering your username and password and then clicking on the "Enrolment" module.

The username and password will be sent in advance to the personal emails of the new applicants. The username will be the same as the one used in the UTEQ application system and the password will have the following format (cedula*year of birth). They will have to register a socio-economic survey, update their personal data and upload their baccalaureate data, after which they will be able to access the "Enrolment" module and accept their enrolment.

Applicants who will be studying for the second time must select the subject(s), in which case a fee will be charged for the loss of free tuition, which must be paid by 5 December 2023. If payment is not made on time, the enrolment will be cancelled.

Link to the Banco del Pacífico payment tutorial to facilitate the process.

It is important that you comply with the established requirements to legalise your studies at the Universidad Técnica Estatal de Quevedo and not lose your enrolment!

Check the important dates in the Academic Calendar of Nivelación 2023-2024 SPA.
